website_summaries.verdict: The Westone W10 in-canal earphones deliver an excellent balance of lows and highs that should appeal to purists.
pros: Excellent balance of lows and highs, with a focus on the high-mids
Includes a treasure trove of accessories, including multiple eartips and two detachable cables
Inline remote control and microphone for mobile devices

customer_reviews.title: My Type of Sound.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a couple of years ago on Amazon. I’m surprised by the mixed reviews but sound is a very personal thing. For me these are very neutral and compared to other similar priced IEMs I like the detail in the mid and top ends. The fit with the foam buds is flush and very comfortable in my ears for long listening. Treat with respect and hopefully you will get as much enjoyment as I have from these IEMs.
customer_reviews.author: MSR Hants

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound!! I thought, until now, that I had a problem with 'in-ears', but now realise that all the predecessors were simply inferior to this 4driver wonder!
customer_reviews.author: C V TAGGART

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and fit, horrible build quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and fit, won't get into that as others covered it at length. However, I had 2 pairs and each of them broke in some way or another after only w few months. Luckily, Amazon was awesome as usual and refunded without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Daviddusty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earphones
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, excellent earphones with great sound, good range of tips (I have small ears & these are perfect) & exceptionally comfortable for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: delph

customer_reviews.title: Price a bit high, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It is high quality sound IEM. I was recommended by my friend. To be honest, the price is bit high. But when you unpacked the box and put it into your ear, I think it is well worth it. It is very good for noise cancelling. the sound is very balance. Good for listening all kind of music. It comes with lost of ear tips to fit your ear.
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: Over-priced with some 'iffy' build quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is OK. Very 'mid-rangie' which tends to hide the bass somewhat. In addition, all the plastic shells have cracked. I know Westone have their fans but as a general statement I'd say they are over-priced for what they are and the build quality leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. B. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Superb headphones much better sound quality than the Shure SE535
customer_reviews.author: M. FOX

customer_reviews.title: great quality phones and all the accessories that come along ...
customer_reviews.text: great quality phones and all the accessories that come along with... my only concern is the braided cable (seems very delicate and im scared it shouldn't snap up at the most nominal usage).. as for the sound.. im not an audiophile but I used to own a pair of A161P prior to this.. and haven't been happier ever since.. like I said not an audiophile so I cant compare how good the w10 fare as compared to A161P but its definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: ishwaraj sagar

customer_reviews.title: clear sounds and as always very comfortable. However I have only used this for 1-2 ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars for the quality of the product, clear sounds and as always very comfortable. However I have only used this for 1-2 months and the connectivity of the braided cable is already breaking up, and that's just for normal usage while walking. Quite disappointed with that as the reason of purchasing Westone was that my last earphone (Westone 1), had amazing sound and also very durable. The connectivity only begun to break after 2 years of almost daily usage, and hence why I purchased the Westone W10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I was going to get it because there's not many reviews online. But these earphones are AMAZING. I listen to more mainstream music, a mix of pop/live/EDM. While it certainly lacks the bass (it did tighten after 48 hours of playback music), it's definitely an amazing pair of earphones. Westone earphones have never failed to impress. I think it's my third pair (an upgrade from a more basic pair). The noise canceling bit is good as well. I use them at work and even at very low volumes, it does block out all the noise despite having an open concept office with fairly noisy colleagues. So definitely good for both quality of music for all purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Lim

customer_reviews.title: If god wore earphones he'd wear these
customer_reviews.text: Sublime. Ridiculously. Don't bemoan the price. Do overtime. I worked 8 days to buy mine. They're getting better with playing in too. Shure 425,535, Sennheiser IE80 and Grado G10's have nothing on these, I've owned them all.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Lovely earphones and a real revelation
customer_reviews.text: I have owned mine for over a year and although I have Bose and Bowers & Wilkins headsets these inner ear phones are far superior. Paired with a FIIO mont blanc amplifier and an IPhone connector these ear phones are just wonderful. So much so that I don't use the other headphones anymore. The west tones show up the other brands inadequacies ...... when they eventually wear out I am going to have to grit my teeth and get the west tone w60's which are apparently even better...
customer_reviews.author: David Simister

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality of sound is average. Hears hurt after more than an hour of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitrii Konstantinov

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, but the stalk onto which the earbud is placed is VERY delicate. Mine broke within 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: John Diffley

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality and amateur design
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably poor building quality. The amateurish build of the MMCX connectors are not fit for purpose nor capable of being re-connected more than a handful of times before breaking in their weak plastic moulds. The build quality of my Shure SE215s is significantly better and puts these W30s to shame. Of course, my Campfire Audio Vegas are better still. Why anyone would waste money on imitations IEMs such as these is unclear. A total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Pipps

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones but defective cable.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the package today, to start off I am no expert. The packaging looked great and product arrived on time. Sound quality was great as well. The carrying box did not look very good on pictures but it actually feels very sturdy and solid. Overall I would have given it a 4 or 5 out of 5 however, one of the cables included in my package was defective and loose on the left side. It does not stick to the earphones properly and keeps disconnecting. Still considering if I should get a refund since I really like the product as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: YJ

product_meta.title: Westone W10 Single Driver IEM Earphones with Detachable Cable - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:W10 - Single Driver| Customer Package Type:Standard PackagingWestone W10 Elementary listening with Westone's entry-level W10 IEM earphones equipped with a specially tuned single balanced armature driver. Westone W10 universal-fit in-ear monitors open up the full potential of audio when listening to reference grade audio recordings. It is a great first-level option and a perfect upgrade from dynamic driver earphones to unlock the hidden potential of portable audio and video devices. With the custom made and expertly tuned single balanced armature driver beating in the core, the W10 monitors provide high fidelity sound reproduction. Using the same advanced technology found in Westone’s iconic ES Series, the W10 delivers extraordinary detail and clarity. To convey the high-fidelity sound of the W10 in total balance and without colouration, Westone have created the EPIC detachable cable. It has been crafted from highly innovative wire, reinforced with a special aramid fibre, and braided for durability. This EPIC cable eliminates microphonic noise while transferring pure and unadulterated sound. Your personal listening realm.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Westone W10 Single Driver IEM Earphones with Detachable Cable - Black
feature_bullets: Single custom-made micro balanced armature driver
Star and True-Fit silicone ear tips in multiple sizes
Detachable EPIC cable for stunning audio resolution
Apple compatible audio cable with 3-button controls
Black, blue and red colour exchangeable faceplates
